programme.title: Assir Al Madfoun
programme.desc: A murder case that remained unsolved for 10 years is reopened when the victim's friend reappears and his father points an accusing finger at the long-absent friend.

programme.title: Life Song
programme.desc: Beyram returns to his native Istanbul to reconcile with his close friend, and they agree to marry their children Kerim and Melek when they grow up. Kerim grew up in Germany; but his father forces him to return and marry Melek, but Hulya, Melek's younger sister, wants to marry him.

programme.title: My Home My Destiny
programme.desc: Zeynep is a young law student who finds herself torn between her two mothers. She has been trying for years to equalize the two parties and is appreciative of her mother's genuine sacrifices, but she also works hard to fulfill her mother's other ambitions.

programme.title: Assir Al Madfoun
programme.desc: A murder case that remained unsolved for 10 years is reopened when the victim's friend reappears and his father points an accusing finger at the long-absent friend.

programme.title: Child
programme.desc: In the hopes of giving her baby a better life, Akça, a hooker, is forced to give up her child, who is taken to be brought up by the wealthy Sule, but the situation changes after the latter has a baby of her own.

programme.title: My Siblings
programme.desc: The events of the series revolve around the life and fate of four siblings after the death of their father, as they are forced to struggle in life and face some obstacles in their way.

programme.title: Secrets of an Angel
programme.desc: After years of abuse at the hands of her husband, Cennet phones Zeynep, a lawyer. After his death, he leaves a letter, which turns out to be a criminal complaint, upon which the lives of Cennet's children and Yilmaz will never be the same after that day.

programme.title: Hayet Khassa
programme.desc: The series sheds light on the daily life of Tunisian youth, through the depiction of the everyday lives of college students and the problems they encounter as they graduate and start working, with a focus on the struggles working women face to balance their jobs with their obligations at home.

programme.title: Ahl Al-Gharam 3
programme.desc: A romantic drama that highlights love stories which end with failure due to various social circumstances. The five parts are called "The Impossible Love", "September Rain", "After You, My Love", "Thank You for Forgetting", "Beautiful Like the Moon", and "O Neighbor of the Valley".

programme.desc: The events revolve around the bitter reality of young Algerians, who resort to fleeing and traveling illegally in search of a better future, which reveals many tragic stories.

programme.desc: The events revolve around the bitter reality of young Algerians, who resort to fleeing and traveling illegally in search of a better future, which reveals many tragic stories.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: Asia
programme.desc: From Hong Kong, the most important global business and breaking markets news information as it happens.

programme.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Middle East & Africa

programme.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Europe

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: Today

programme.desc: Delivering the market news, data and analysis you need to set your agenda.

programme.desc: Daily conversations with leaders and decision makers from Wall Street to Washington and beyond. Hosted by Jonathan Ferro, Lisa Abramowicz and Annmarie Hordern.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets
programme.desc: Bloomberg Markets is focused on bringing you the most important global business and breaking markets news and information as it happens.

programme.title: Bloomberg Technology

programme.desc: As the two friends Mordecai the blue jay and Rigby the raccoon work as groundskeepers at a local park, they land themselves in various trouble while trying to have fun in any way possible.

programme.title: Adventure Time
programme.desc: The story follows a boy named Finn and his friend Jake the dog who has magical powers, as they both live in the Land of Ooo where they embark on wild adventures with other characters including the Ice King and Princess Bubblegum.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S1
programme.desc: The adventures of the three bear brothers, Grizzly, Panda, and Ice Bear, as they try to fit in among the human world and make friends with the humans while searching for food and shelter.

programme.title: Ben 10 S1
programme.desc: A young boy finds a device resembling a watch that can transform him into 10 different alien creatures.

programme.title: Roll No. 21
programme.desc: As the wicked Kansa disguises himself as the benevolent principal of a school for orphans Kanishk while plotting to seize control over Earth, the gods decide to send Krishna to pass himself off as Kris, a student of the school, in order to foil his evil plans.

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls
programme.desc: Armed with their superpowers and extra cuteness, Blossom, Bubbles, and Buttercup continue to save the day from all the evil plans the bad guys are intending for Townsville.

programme.title: Ekans - Snakes Awake
programme.desc: The events revolve around a smart thirteen-year-old boy named Ekans, who acquires a supernatural power that gives him the ability to control snakes. Using modern technology, he is able to confront villains and keep his city safe.

programme.desc: A single mother moves to the city with her two kids after discovering that her husband cheated on her. She befriends her younger neighbor, as he becomes exactly what she needs.

programme.title: El Karazoun
programme.desc: A Syrian businessman, Adnan, travels to Beirut and gets exposed to an accident at the port explosion, so he decides to disappear in order to teach his spoiled daughter, Nour, how to be self-reliant and discover the truth around her. However, Karim and Rabee try to seize Nour's wealth.

programme.title: Thuluj alsayf
programme.desc: Among people’s every day stories, Ahmed and Nabila share love but their careers matter a lot in supporting their families. In Laila’s story, she is an undergraduate whose family depends on her father’s small income, and she seldom sees her married siblings. A third story is about Bothayna and Salah who are happily married with a son, but are parted when Salah gets shot while chasing smugglers.

programme.title: Harem Al-Shawish
programme.desc: The series revolves around the love of money and power and how the simple and complicated social issues are resolved. It also discusses the things that disturb the lives of people who bring out evil and good in other people's lives.

programme.title: Baad Edet Sanawat
programme.desc: It discusses the change between the past and the present, as the events are set between the 1980s and the year 2014 through Abu Nawras, who lives in a working-class neighborhood and has many children.

programme.title: Forsa Akhera
programme.desc: The story of a woman whose husband has died. She and her son move to live with his family. Afterwards, her relationship with another man causes many conflicts in the family.

programme.title: El Nar Bel Nar

Maryam's challenges increase with Omran falling in love with her, while she begins to like Aziz, the music teacher, who is still living the aftermath of the Lebanese War, so things turn upside down and wars of revenge threaten.

programme.title: Dirty Laundry
programme.desc: The lives of the wealthiest and most influential families in Istanbul, and their maids frequently become a part of their stories after being exposed to the mysteries, secrets, and murders kept behind closed doors.

programme.desc: The widow Sarah resorts to her only remaining option to cover the costs of her son Ibrahim's cancer treatment, so she agrees to spend one night with the manager of the company, Zain, in return for an amount of money.

programme.desc: Firat is an accomplished federal prosecutor. As he loses his memory and ends up imprisoned after he gets charged with killing his wife and daughter, he must break out of prison in order to find out the truth.

programme.desc: Majid is a young headmaster in a private school, seeking to make some changes at his school, and his life as well; he has no idea that his wish will come true when he bumps into Layal, who works as a dog trainer and a musician in a restaurant.

programme.desc: Thriller, People, Drama 2021 Presenting the story of a man from upper Egypt who is accused of murder; after spending jail time, he returns to revenge from his worst enemies. Amir Karara, Ahmed El Sakka, Mai Omar, Ahmed Malek, Ahmad Dash, Mohamed Samy, Mohamed Samy

programme.title: Arbeeny Fy el Eshreen
programme.desc: Fahd wakes up after a coma that lasted nearly twenty years and finds himself at the age of forty. He tries to remember and learn everything he has missed. He is surprised by his wife's (Ahd) divorce from him, and her closeness to his cousin Saleh. He finds himself at a crossroads, either to continue alone or to defend his previous life and recover it, whatever the consequences are.

programme.title: Bab Al Hara (Ep3)
programme.desc: Drama, People 2008 Last century, during the French occupation, a Syrian neighborhood defending their culture, values and traditions against the enemy. Samer Almasry, Sabah Al Jazaaery, Wafaa Mousilly, Huda Sharawy, Wafeeq Al Zaeem, Bassam Al Molla, Marwan Kawouk

programme.title: Umm Harun
programme.desc: Set in the 1940s, the series chronicles the life of Umm Harun, a doctor residing amongst the townspeople in Kuwait and faces numerous challenges, she and her family as well as the Jewish community at large.

programme.title: Be My Sunshine (Ep74)
programme.desc: Romance, Comedy 2021 Hazira travels to a remote island to explore a land her bosses want to take to establish a resort. She meets Poyraz, a young man who owns a small olive factory. Without knowing, she ruins his work. Ayca Aysin Turan, Alp Navruz, Nihan Büyükagaç, Ipek Tenolcay, Bülent Çolak, Ali Bilgin, Özgür Sevimli, Aksel Bonfil, Yesim Citak, Yelda Eroglu, Dilek Iyigün, Emine Yildirim

programme.title: Bade Achhe Lagte Hain 2
programme.desc: Priya and Ram are two people from different worlds. As circumstances bring them together, they get married, and over time, their bond gets stronger as they fall in love.

programme.title: Home Shopping (Ep3742)
programme.desc: Entertainment, Shopping 2005 Discover the latest promotions on global products that you will never find at such an incredible price.

programme.title: Jazeerat Ghamam
programme.desc: When Khaldoun and the gypsy Al-Ayqa settle on Ghamam island, they try to control its people, thinking that it contains a treasure and a great secret that no one knows. As they try to extend their influence to implement their plan, will the people of the island confront them led by Arafat, El Ajami, and Muharib?

programme.desc: Shopping, Entertainment 2005 Discover the latest promotions on global products that you will never find at such an incredible price.

programme.title: Zelzal
programme.desc: Harbi buys a house in installments from Khalil who refuses to register the house in Harbi's name after he completes the payment. When the earthquake of 1992 happens, Harbi dies. Khalil refuses to hand over the land to the heirs and clashes with Harbi's son, Mohamed, who loves Khalil's daughter.

programme.title: Al-Heiba Al-Awda
programme.desc: When Jabal's father is murdered, the blood feud sends his family and the Al-Sa'eid family into a cycle of violence and tribal conflicts, as those who have unfinished business with Jabal's father appear to complicate things for Jabal.

programme.title: Udaariyaan
programme.desc: Sandhu's family comes from a small village in Punjab; however, as the daughter Jasmine dreams of immigrating to Canada, the dreams of the two sisters Tejo and Jasmine soon change when fate brings them a different reality.

programme.title: Hayya Al Rouh
programme.desc: The story follows an angelic girl named Haya, who, despite her disability, defies all circumstances and insists on confronting them, especially her uncle Mubarak, who left her in the care of her stepfather, Abdul Rahman.

programme.title: End Share 9
programme.desc: After he became wealthy following an unexpected event that took place years ago, Fares finds himself targeted by Adnan and a person close to him.

programme.title: Nassibi w Esmetek 4
programme.desc: An anthology series of various tales from everyday life, including the story, "The White Eyeglasses", that follows Fakhr, who invents a pair of glasses that, when worn, can tell you how others truly feel about you underneath the lies and niceties.

programme.desc: Mae Pero, cath yr Harbwr Feistr, ar goll ac mae pawb yn ceisio eu gorau glas i ddod o hyd iddo. Pero, the Harbourmaster's cat is missing. Everyone's on the lookout for him but where is he?

programme.title: Sbarc
programme.desc: Cyfres wyddoniaeth i blant gyda Tudur Phillips a'i ddau ffrind, Sbarc y gwyddonydd a Nef y Ditectif Natur. Pre-school science series with Tudur Phillips and friends. Today's theme is Trees.

programme.title: Blociau Lliw
programme.desc: Pan mae'n cyfarfod â Glas mae Coch wedi ei syfrdanu mai nad hi yw'r unig liw yng Ngwlad y Lliwiau. Red is surprised to discover she's not the only colour in the world when she meets Blue.

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Mae Crawc yn penderfynu creu ei bersawr chwaethus ei hun. When the weasels ruin Toad's perfume and then occupy his home, is the new stinky cologne the answer to regaining Toad Hall?

programme.title: Bendibwmbwls
programme.desc: Mae Ben Dant ar antur newydd i ailgylchu a throi sbwriel yn sbeshal, efo disgyblion Ysgol Gymraeg Bro Teyr. Ben Dant is on a new adventure to recycle and turn rubbish into something special.

programme.title: Blero'n mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Pan fydd Blero'n helpu Rheinallt i bobi mae pethau'n mynd o chwith wrth iddo gael y mesuriadau'n anghywir. A spot of baking with Rheinallt goes awry when Blero gets the quantities wrong!

programme.title: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Heddiw, bydd Huw yn ymuno gyda theulu sy'n cneifio ar eu fferm, Erin yn chwarae rygbi, a Meleri yn mynd am dro gyda Mai ym Mharc Cwm Darran. Today: sheep shearing and rugby.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Sain Ffagan
programme.desc: Cyfres newydd. Y tro hwn mae'r Amgueddfa'n cynnal gwyl Hindwaidd Diwali, mae'r garddwyr yn brysur yn cynaeafu afalau, ac mae angel ar goll o eglwys Sant Teilo. We return to St. Fagans. [SL]

programme.title: Heno
programme.desc: Rhaglen gylchgrawn nosweithiol gyda straeon o bob cwr o Gymru. Nightly magazine with stories from all over Wales and special guests.

programme.title: Cymoedd Roy Noble
programme.desc: Dyffryn Aman sy'n cael y sylw - dyffryn genedigol Roy a dyffryn sy'n agos iawn at ei galon. Roy returns to the Amman Valley where he grew up, calling in Brynamman, Tairgwaith and Ammanford.

programme.title: Cefn Gwlad
programme.desc: Mae'n ddechrau pennod newydd yn hanes tafarn Yr Eagles, Llanuwchllyn wrth i'r perchnogion ers 20ml adael. A new era begins at the Eagles, Llanuchwllyn as a community group takes over.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: New: Prynhawn Da
programme.desc: Cyfres gylchgrawn gydag eitemau coginio a ffasiwn a chyngor am bopeth o addurno'ch cartref i ddewis llyfr da. Magazine series including features on fashion, style, antiques and cookery.

programme.title: New: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Am Dro
programme.desc: Andy, Carys, Sian a Gwilym sy'n mynd am dro i Fodffordd a Llangefni, Caernarfon a'r Foryd, Llandaf a Chaerdydd, a Charreg Cennen. We walk around Llangefni, Caernarfon, Cardiff, & a castle.

programme.title: Blociau Lliw
programme.desc: Mae Glas cwl iawn yn ymddangos yng Ngwlad y Lliwiau. Dysga am y lliw glas. Cool Blue arrives in Colourland. Learn about the colour blue.

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Wrth wylio Pigog ar farcud newydd Crawc, mae'r gwencïod yn cael syniad am sut i dorri mewn i'r Crawcdy. Hedge accidentally gives the Weasels an idea of how to get into Toad Hall.

programme.title: Bendibwmbwls
programme.desc: Cyfres gomedi, celf a chân i blant 4-7 mlwydd oed lle mae Aeron Pugh fel y cymeriad Bendant yn ymuno â dosbarthiadau plant ledled Cymru. Comedy, art and singing series for children aged 4-7.

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Pan mae Magi'n cynhaeafu kohlrabi, mae Jay a Mario'n siwr bod aliwn wedi dod i Bentre Braf. Jay and Mario are convinced that aliens have come to Pentre Braf!

programme.title: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Heddiw, bydd Meleri a'r criw yn cyfeiriannu ym Mharc Craig y Nos, ac fe fydd Alys a'i ffrind Mila yn gwersylla. Today, Huw and Elan will be surfing in Caswell Bay.

programme.title: Oi! Osgar
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Oscar y fadfall a'i ffrindiau yn yr anialwch chwilboeth. A cartoon following the adventures of Oscar and friends in the arid desert - as they try not to die of boredom!

programme.title: New: Mwy o Stwnsh Sadwrn
programme.desc: Cipolwg yn ôl dros rai o uchafbwyntiau rhaglen dydd Sadwrn. Tune in to relive some of the highlights of Saturday's programme.

programme.title: New: Prys a'r Pryfed
programme.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd ym myd Prys a'r Pryfed heddiw? What's happening in Prys a'r Pryfed's world today?

programme.title: New: Boom!
programme.desc: Y tro hwn, bydd y brodyr Bidder yn mynd i Ysgol Gymraeg Glan Ceubal ar gyfer her ludiog ac arbrawf ffyrnig gyda ffrwythau ac asid. This time - a fierce experiment with fruit and acid.

programme.title: Bois y Pizza: Chwe' Gwlad
programme.desc: Mae'r bois dal ar yr hewl a wedi teithio lan yr arfordir i Aberystwyth. This time we're in Aberystwyth and the boys cook pizzas for the head chef and Great British Menu star - Nathan Davies.

programme.title: Sgorio
programme.desc: Cyfres llawn cyffro pêl-droed y pyramid Cymreig. Highlights of the weekend's games including Newtown v Bala Town, Pontypridd United v Colwyn Bay and Pen-y-bont v Aberystwyth Town.

programme.title: New: Heno
programme.desc: Rhaglen gylchgrawn nosweithiol gyda straeon o bob cwr o Gymru. Nightly magazine with stories from all over Wales and special guests.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Pobol y Cwm
programme.desc: Gyda'r gwasanaeth goffa heddiw, a fydd popeth yn mynd yn ôl y disgwyl? It doesn't bode well for Howard as Kelly and Rhys visit Deri Fawr.

programme.title: Rownd a Rownd
programme.desc: Mae Mair yn hel esgusodion i dreulio mwy o amser efo Cai ac mae Anna a Beca yn dechrau holi cwestiynau. It's the day of the year 9 football tournament and it all becomes too much for Ioan.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: New: Stryd i'r Sgrym
programme.desc: Bydd Rhian, hyfforddwr y tîm, yn cwrdd â'i harwr hyfforddi, Warren Gatland, wrth iddo baratoi tîm Cymru ar gyfer y Chwe Gwlad. The team meet their rugby hero - ex-captain Ken Owens.

programme.title: Ffilmiau Ddoe
programme.desc: Gwyliau fydd dan sylw Ffion Dafis a'i gwesteion wrth iddynt edrych ar hen ffilmiau o'r Archif Sgrin a Sain. Gwion Hallam's journey takes him from Llandudno to Burry Port and the Urdd camps.

programme.title: Ffilmiau Ddoe Ffion Dafis - Season 1, Episode 2
New: Gweriniaeth Iwerddon v Cymru
programme.desc: Dangosiad o'r gêm rhwng Gweriniaeth Iwerddon a Chymru a chwaraewyd yn gynharach heddiw. Tallaght Stadium, Dulyn. Broadcast of the Republic of Ireland v Wales game played earlier today.

programme.title: Pêl-Droed Rhyngwladol Gweriniaeth Iwerddon v Chymru 27.02

programme.desc: Mae nofelydd enwog yn cael ei ganfod yn farw yn ei fflat. Mae pennaeth Raphaelle yn siwr ei fod yn achos o hunanladdiad. A famous novelist is found dead but is it really death by suicide?
